name: Richard COOPERSTEIN, Executor of the Estate of Elsie Cooperstein, Deceased, and Ruth A. Gorneau, Administratrix of the Estate of Anne Nathan, Deceased, Appellants, v. LIBERTY MUTUAL FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY, and Jack Cooperstein, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Cooperstein v. Liberty Mutual Fire Insurance
docket_number: Appeal No. 26 Eastern District Appeal Docket 1994

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
parties: Richard COOPERSTEIN, Executor of the Estate of Elsie Cooperstein, Deceased, and Ruth A. Gorneau, Administratrix of the Estate of Anne Nathan, Deceased, Appellants, v. LIBERTY MUTUAL FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY, and Jack Cooperstein, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Lawrence S. Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for Cooperstein and Gourneau.
L. Rostaing Tharaud, Philadelphia, for Liberty Mut. Fire Ins. Co.
Lisa M. Bellino, Philadelphia, for J. Cooperstein.
casebody.head_matter:
649 A.2d 434
Richard COOPERSTEIN, Executor of the Estate of Elsie Cooperstein, Deceased, and Ruth A. Gorneau, Administratrix of the Estate of Anne Nathan, Deceased, Appellants, v. LIBERTY MUTUAL FIRE INSURANCE COMPANY, and Jack Cooperstein, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Sept. 30, 1994.
Decided Nov. 4, 1994.
Lawrence S. Rosenwald, Philadelphia, for Cooperstein and Gourneau.
L. Rostaing Tharaud, Philadelphia, for Liberty Mut. Fire Ins. Co.
Lisa M. Bellino, Philadelphia, for J. Cooperstein.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
